about_the_game:
Diddy

Genre: Survival / Action / Co-op

Description: Are you ready to destroy a dark party in Diddy’s Mansion? Gather your comrades 51 Cent and Eminam, and put an end to Diddy’s dirty deeds, defeating him and rescuing Justin B., who has amassed his fortune through deceit.

In this game, you will face not only Diddy but also an army of celebrities guarding his mansion. Among Diddy’s men are powerful and influential celebrities, each ready to fight to defend the mansion. But with your comrades Eminam and 51 Cent, you will do everything you can to win this tough battle.


From Diddy’s Mansion to a grand casino and locations where Diddy’s secret vault is hidden, this action-packed adventure will have you completing difficult missions, solving small puzzles, and attempting to rescue Justin B. Playing in co-op mode with friends, you’ll need tactical intelligence to defeat the celebrity-filled enemy army and ruin Diddy’s plans.


Can you and your comrades bring justice to Diddy’s mysterious world, overcoming every obstacle you face? Stop Diddy, rescue Justin B., and bring this chaotic party to an end!

name: Diddy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.
  • Processor: Windows 8
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Radeon HD 7970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.
  • Processor: Windows 10
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 or Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Destroy a dark party in Diddy's mansion. Gather your comrades Eminam and 51 Cent and save Justin B from Diddy! You can destroy the party with your friends by experiencing co-op
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
